title: FS: Broad Leaf 350 Jack Knight W/ Bat PSA 4.5

posts.post_title: FS: Broad Leaf 350 Jack Knight W/ Bat PSA 4.5
posts.post_content:
This example is the highest example graded by PSA, with only 3 total examples in their population (2 graded PSA 1 and this PSA 4.5). I am selling this beauty for $3400 net to me, delivered. Please PM to reserve

[IMG][url=https://flic.kr/p/2gRMXoP][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48477518751_bdff9ce325_c.jpg[/img][/url]

[IMG][url=https://flic.kr/p/2gRNHkH][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48477666587_b394e36ba2_c.jpg[/img][/url]
Friday morning bump. Price lowered to $3400 (net to me) delivered.
